report: Authorized assessment of http://localhost:8080 could not be completed; planned nmap (http*,vuln) and Nikto scans did not execute, so no vulnerabilities or misconfigurations were validated. Findings: None confirmed at this time. Notable evidence: None collected (no HTTP responses, headers, or endpoint data captured). Next steps: Execute the queued scans safely, then conduct targeted OWASP Top 10-focused tests (auth/authz, input validation, session management, file handling, deserialization), review server/config headers and access controls, capture request/response evidence, and deliver remediation guidance per each confirmed issue.
